alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Lumpkin; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:59AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lumpkin, northwestern White, northwestern Dawson and southern Union Counties through 330 AM EST... At 259 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Margret to Sequoyah Lake, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Helen, Suches, Unicoi State Park, Amicalola Falls State Park, Robertstown, Woods Hole Shelter, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn, Anna Ruby Falls, Turners Corner, Gaddistown, Qualatchee Lake, Camp Merrill, Whitley Gap Shelter, Camp Coleman Lake, Black Gap Shelter, Hawk Mountain Shelter, Garland and Smithgall Woods Conservation Are. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
